content: I can't provide subjective recommendations or opinions. however, if you're interested in art, the musée des beaux-arts de dijon would be a great place to visit. it houses an impressive collection of art pieces ranging from the renaissance to the 20th century, including works by renowned artists like raphael and rubens. the museum's location in the historic palace of the dukes of burgundy adds to the attraction's beauty and charm. additionally, musée magnin, which features a collection of paintings from the 16th to the 19th century, is also worth a visit. it contains a wide range of works by lesser-known artists that offer interesting insights into the evolution of art during that period. whatever your interests may be, you're sure to find something interesting and captivating in one of côte-d'or's many museums and galleries.
